Title: 40929 - # Tips for Businesses Using Cloud Accounting
Direction: 675 words. Create a list of 4-8 tips for businesses who are new to using cloud accounting software. You can discuss the benefits, how to use certain kinds of software, and discuss how to easily transition into the cloud accounting world. Your target audience is small to mid-size business owners. You can link to your target URL by mentioning that it’s important to use the right software, and suggesting Sage One as easy to use and convenient cloud accounting software.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: convenient cloud accounting with Sage One
